code:
class Solution:
    def minArraySum(self, a: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        t=0
        for x in a: t+=x
        b=[-inf]*k
        b[0]=0
        d=0
        p=0
        for x in a:
            p+=x
            r=p%k
            v=b[r]+p
            if d<v: d=v
            w=d-p
            if b[r]<w: b[r]=w
        return t-d

class Solution:
    def minArraySum(self, a: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(a)
        bm = [-sys.maxsize] * k
        bm[0] = 0
        ps = 0
        dp = 0
        for x in a:
            ps += x
            r = ps % k
            c = bm[r] + ps
            dp = max(dp, c)
            bm[r] = max(bm[r], dp - ps)
        return ps - dp
